block.p: Jessica Lynn Wolfe and Ashley Reid Barbour are to be married today in Bryn Mawr, Pa. Judge Calvin S. Drayer Jr. of the Montgomery County Court of Common Pleas is to officiate at Bryn Mawr College, from which the bride graduated summa cum laude.
The couple teach English at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, specializing in Renaissance literature. The bride is an assistant professor, and the bridegroom a professor.

Jessica Lynn Wolfe and Ashley Reid Barbour are to be married today in Bryn Mawr, Pa. Judge Calvin S. Drayer Jr. of the Montgomery County Court of Common Pleas is to officiate at Bryn Mawr College, from which the bride graduated summa cum laude.
The couple teach English at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, specializing in Renaissance literature. The bride is an assistant professor, and the bridegroom a professor.

Ms. Wolfe, 30, will keep her name. She is to receive a Ph.D. in English literature from Stanford University this month. She is the daughter of Carol and Steven W. Wolfe of New York. Her father is a senior partner in Kantor, Davidoff, Wolfe, Mandelker & Kass, a New York law firm. Her mother is an interior designer in New York.

Mr. Barbour, 39, is known as Reid. He is the author of ''English Epicures and Stoics: Ancient Legacies in Early Stuart Culture'' (University of Massachusetts Press, 1998). He graduated with highest distinction from Chapel Hill and received a Ph.D. in English literature from the University of Rochester. He is a son of Mary Anne and Durwood Barbour of Raleigh, N.C. His mother retired as an office manager in Raleigh for the public schools of Wake County, N.C. His father retired as an engineer in Raleigh for the State Highway Department.
